# Accessibility (a11y) Review Rules (Quick Level)

**Version**: 2025-01-12
**Official Sources**:
- https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/quickref/
- https://github.com/angular/components (Material a11y)
- WCAG 2.1 Level AA

**Last Checked**: 2025-01-12

---

## ðŸ”´ CRITICAL ISSUES (Must Fix)

### Semantic HTML
- [ ] Use semantic HTML elements (button, nav, main, article, etc.)
- [ ] Proper heading hierarchy (h1 â†’ h2 â†’ h3, no skipping levels)
- [ ] Form inputs have associated labels
- [ ] Use native elements over div with role

### Keyboard Navigation
- [ ] All interactive elements keyboard accessible
- [ ] Logical tab order (tabindex >= 0 or native focusable elements)
- [ ] No keyboard traps
- [ ] Focus visible on all interactive elements
- [ ] Skip links for main content

### ARIA
- [ ] ARIA labels on icon-only buttons (aria-label or aria-labelledby)
- [ ] ARIA roles used correctly
- [ ] Dynamic content updates announced (aria-live)
- [ ] Form errors associated with inputs (aria-describedby)

### Color & Contrast
- [ ] Color is not the only visual indicator
- [ ] Text contrast ratio â‰¥ 4.5:1 (normal text)
- [ ] Text contrast ratio â‰¥ 3:1 (large text)
- [ ] Focus indicators have sufficient contrast

---

## ðŸŸ¡ WARNINGS (Should Fix)

### Images
- [ ] All images have alt text (or alt="" for decorative)
- [ ] Complex images have detailed descriptions
- [ ] SVG icons have title or aria-label

### Forms
- [ ] Error messages are clear and associated with fields
- [ ] Required fields marked with aria-required or required
- [ ] Validation errors announced to screen readers

### Dynamic Content
- [ ] Loading states announced (aria-busy or aria-live)
- [ ] Route changes announced to screen readers
- [ ] Modal dialogs trap focus
- [ ] Focus returns to trigger element after dialog closes

### Links & Buttons
- [ ] Links and buttons have meaningful text (not "click here")
- [ ] Link purpose clear from text or context
- [ ] Disabled state communicated (aria-disabled)

---

## ðŸŸ¢ BEST PRACTICES
- [ ] Test with screen readers (NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver)
- [ ] Test keyboard-only navigation
- [ ] Use axe DevTools or similar linter
- [ ] Support browser zoom up to 200%
- [ ] Provide alternative text for non-text content
- [ ] Use Angular CDK a11y utilities

---

## ðŸ“‹ Auto-Fix Available (--fix flag)
1. Add missing aria-label to icon buttons
2. Add alt text placeholder to images
3. Fix heading hierarchy
4. Add form label associations
5. Add lang attribute to html element
